meanings.sent1: The workers will hydrocrack the petroleum to make it more useful.
meanings.sent2: They hydrocrack the crude oil to produce gasoline.
meanings.sent3: Why did the scientist hydrocrack the oil? To see what happens!

meanings.definition: A process for converting heavy hydrocarbons into lighter fractions by the action of hydrogen under high pressure in the presence of a catalyst.
meanings.sent1: The hydrocrack helps in converting heavy hydrocarbons into lighter ones.
meanings.sent2: The refinery uses a hydrocrack to produce valuable fuels.
meanings.sent3: During the tour, we saw the hydrocrack turning heavy oil into lighter products.
meanings.sent4: The hydrocrack is like a magical machine that transforms heavy substances into lighter ones.
meanings.sent5: The hydrocrack at the plant works tirelessly to create useful products from heavy materials.
